DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and feasibility of the Chartis System in measuring air flow and pressures in isolated lung compartments during bronchoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Feasibility Study of the Chartis System
DOC.criteria: Scheduled to undergo clinically indicated routine diagnostic bronchoscopy Hyperexcretive chronic bronchitis or excessive sputum secretion Active pulmonary infection FEV1 <20% predicted FVC <50% predicted
DOC.keyword: Clinically indicated for routine diagnostic bronchoscopy
